body:
Cards and spells that allow a card to be put onto the battlefield from the hand, should only have the chosen card chosen on resolution of the spell or ability, not when it is activated.

This non-targeted option is already defined with SearchOntoBattlefield and SearchIntoHand effects, but not from the hand.

A simple example would be activating Elvish Piper, opponent bounces a creature in response. When elvish piper resolves, should have the choice to play the bounced creature.
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: "a card from your hand onto the battlefield" effects
content:
_From [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/) on March 19, 2014 07:32:32_

Cards and spells that allow a card to be put onto the battlefield from the hand, should only have the chosen card chosen on resolution of the spell or ability, not when it is activated.

This non-targeted option is already defined with SearchOntoBattlefield and SearchIntoHand effects, but not from the hand.

A simple example would be activating Elvish Piper, opponent bounces a creature in response. When elvish piper resolves, should have the choice to play the bounced creature.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=529_
